languages.text: {n}Секунда — и тело Идиры сползает на пол. В то же мгновение вы слышите жуткий звук — пронзительный визгливый смех.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Гремит выстрел — и голова Идиры превращается в кровавое облако, которое с едва слышным шелестом оседает на стене и полу. В то же мгновение вы слышите еще один звук — пронзительный визгливый смех.{/n}

languages.text: {n}One second — and Idira's body sags to the floor. At the same moment, you hear a terrifying sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Секунда — и тело Идиры сползает на пол. В то же мгновение вы слышите жуткий звук — пронзительный визгливый смех.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The shot rings out — and Indira's head turns into a bloody cloud that disperses and settles on the wall and floor with a barely audible hiss. At the same moment, you hear another sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}

{n}The shot rings out — and Idira's head turns into a bloody cloud that disperses and settles on the wall and floor with a barely audible hiss. At the same moment, you hear another sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}

{n}The shot rings out — and Indira's head turns into a bloody cloud that disperses and settles on the wall and floor with a barely audible hiss. At the same moment, you hear another sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}
{n}One second — and Idira's body sags to the floor. At the same moment, you hear a terrifying sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}
{n}One second — and Idira's body sags to the floor. At the same moment, you hear a terrifying sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}

languages.text: {n}仅仅一秒钟之后，伊迪拉的尸体就倒在了地上。与此同时，你听到了某个可怕的声音发出了尖锐、刺耳的大笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One second — and Idira's body sags to the floor. At the same moment, you hear a terrifying sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}仅仅一秒钟之后，伊迪拉的尸体就倒在了地上。与此同时，你听到了某个可怕的声音发出了尖锐、刺耳的大笑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En un segundo, el cuerpo de Idira cae al suelo. Al mismo tiempo, oyes un sonido aterrador: una risa estridente y perforante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One second — and Idira's body sags to the floor. At the same moment, you hear a terrifying sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En un segundo, el cuerpo de Idira cae al suelo. Al mismo tiempo, oyes un sonido aterrador: una risa estridente y perforante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}たった1秒―それだけでイディラの体が床に倒れ込む。その瞬間、あなたは恐ろしい音を耳にした。悲鳴のような、突き刺すような笑い声を。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One second — and Idira's body sags to the floor. At the same moment, you hear a terrifying sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}たった1秒―それだけでイディラの体が床に倒れ込む。その瞬間、あなたは恐ろしい音を耳にした。悲鳴のような、突き刺すような笑い声を。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Sekunde sinkt Idira leblos zu Boden. Im gleichen Moment hörst du ein entsetzliches Geräusch ... ein schrilles und markerschütterndes Lachen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One second — and Idira's body sags to the floor. At the same moment, you hear a terrifying sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Sekunde sinkt Idira leblos zu Boden. Im gleichen Moment hörst du ein entsetzliches Geräusch ... ein schrilles und markerschütterndes Lachen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une seconde plus tard, le corps inerte d'Idira s'effondre au sol, accompagné d'un bruit terrifiant... un rire strident à vous crever les tympans.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One second — and Idira's body sags to the floor. At the same moment, you hear a terrifying sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une seconde plus tard, le corps inerte d'Idira s'effondre au sol, accompagné d'un bruit terrifiant... un rire strident à vous crever les tympans.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Göz açıp kapayıncaya dek İdira'nın bedeni yere seriliyor. Aynı anda korkunç bir ses duyuyorsun: Keskin, kulak delici bir kahkaha yankılanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One second — and Idira's body sags to the floor. At the same moment, you hear a terrifying sound — shrill and piercing laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Göz açıp kapayıncaya dek İdira'nın bedeni yere seriliyor. Aynı anda korkunç bir ses duyuyorsun: Keskin ve kulakları delen bir kahkaha.{/n}
